emision-pago-2101: select stspol from poliza where numpol=? and codpol='2101'
calculo-sin-prima:
select p.idepol, p.codprod, p.numpol, dp.numcert, dp.codplan, dp.revplan, dp.codramocert, dp.codcrit,dp.codtrasf, dp.valtrasf,
       (select cri.usocrit from criterio cri where cri.codcrit = dp.codcrit) tipo_criterio, 
       (select cri.desccrit from criterio cri where cri.codcrit = dp.codcrit) descripcion, 
       case when (select cri.usocrit from criterio cri where cri.codcrit = dp.codcrit) in ('T') then dp.valtrasf
            when (select cri.usocrit from criterio cri where cri.codcrit = dp.codcrit) in ('C') then decode(dp.codtrasf,'001','Check','UnCheck')
            else (select tra.desctrasf from transformador tra where tra.codcrit = dp.codcrit and tra.codtrasf = dp.codtrasf) 
       end valor      
from poliza p, certificado c, cert_ramo cr, datos_particulares dp
where 1 = 1
and p.codprod = 2101 
and p.numpol = ?
and c.idepol = p.idepol
and cr.idepol = c.idepol
and cr.numcert = c.numcert
and dp.idepol = cr.idepol
and dp.numcert = cr.numcert
and dp.codramocert = cr.codramocert
calculo-prima:
select p.idepol, p.codprod, p.numpol, dp.numcert, dp.codplan, dp.revplan, dp.codramocert, dp.codcrit,dp.codtrasf, dp.valtrasf,
       (select cri.usocrit from criterio cri where cri.codcrit = dp.codcrit) tipo_criterio, 
       (select cri.desccrit from criterio cri where cri.codcrit = dp.codcrit) descripcion, 
       case when (select cri.usocrit from criterio cri where cri.codcrit = dp.codcrit) in ('T') then dp.valtrasf
            when (select cri.usocrit from criterio cri where cri.codcrit = dp.codcrit) in ('C') then decode(dp.codtrasf,'001','Check','UnCheck')
            else (select tra.desctrasf from transformador tra where tra.codcrit = dp.codcrit and tra.codtrasf = dp.codtrasf) 
       end valor      
from poliza p, certificado c, cert_ramo cr, datos_particulares dp
where 1 = 1
and p.codprod = 2101 
and p.numpol = ?
and c.idepol = p.idepol
and cr.idepol = c.idepol
and cr.numcert = c.numcert
and dp.idepol = cr.idepol
and dp.numcert = cr.numcert
and dp.codramocert = cr.codramocert
and dp.codplan = cr.codplan
and dp.revplan = cr.revplan
poliza-vida-ley-activo:
select distinct
       co.item,
       co.TIME_STAMP,
       pro.description Producto,
       pp.numeropolizainput as numeroPoliza,
       st1.description estadoActual,
       co.id as operacion,
       (case co.status when 1 then 'No Aplicado' when 2 then 'Aplicado' when 3 then 'Reverso' else '--' end) estado,
       et.description as evento,
       co.effective_date fechaEvento,
       oi.openitemid,
       oi.dty_id,
oi.amount MONTO,
       oi.status,
       oi.opm_substatus,
       pp.frecuenciapagoinput frecuenciaPago,
       oi.duedate,    
       to_char(oi.DUEDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') inicioVigDocumento,
       to_char(oi.dateuserecipent,'yyyy-mm-dd') finVigDocumento,
       pp.fechaproxfacturacioninput,
       to_char(pdco.initialdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') inicioPoliza,
       to_char(pdco.finishdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') finPoliza,
oi.currencyid,  co.auditdate fechaRegistro
from app_vida.contextoperation co
join app_vida.agregatedpolicy ap on co.item = ap.agregatedpolicyid
join app_vida.product pro on ap.productid=pro.productid
join app_vida.eventdco ed on ed.operationpk = co.id and ed.policypk is not null
join app_vida.eventtype et on ed.eventtypeid = et.eventtypeid
join app_vida.policydco pdco on co.id=pdco.operationpk and co.status in (2,3)
join app_vida.prepolicy pp on pdco.dcoid = pp.pk
join app_vida.policydco pdco1 on pdco1.operationpk=ap.operationpk
join state st1 on pdco1.stateid=st1.stateid
left join app_vida.openitem oi on oi.operationpk = co.id  and oi.status not in ('deleted') and oi.dty_id in (7332,2396,7372)
where
pp.numeropolizainput in (?)
order by co.item, TO_CHAR(co.TIME_STAMP,'yyyy-mm-dd') desc, co.id desc
